testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter valid name and password.....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to add course to course list
testcase.name: logged user adding a course
testcase.system-out: Given user click on course page icon........................................passed And user click on create course button......................................passed When user fill mandatory course fields and click on save....................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to see course title displayed at courses list page
testcase.name: user has created course and checking its name
testcase.system-out: Given user click on course page icon........................................passed When search by course name..................................................passed Then course title is displayed on course page...............................passed
